summary.para: The CERT_CREDENTIAL_INFO structure contains a reference to a certificate.

remarks.para: CERT_HASH_LENGTH is defined as 20 in WinCred.h.

summary.para: Size of the structure in bytes. This member should be set to sizeof(CERT_CREDENTIAL_INFO). This structure might be a larger value in the future, indicating a newer version of the structure.
SHA-1 hash of the certificate referenced.
